I can provide you with information and insights about the various activities and events taking place at Government College of Engineering Kalahandi.

Government College of Engineering, Kalahandi established in the year 2009 by an act of Govt. of Odisha and is functioning as a constituent college of BPUT, Odisha. The institute is located at the district headquarter of Kalahandi, i.e. Bhawanipatna. The exact location is besides the NH 201(Bargarh-Boriguma), about 5 Km away from Bhawanipatna on the way to Junagarh.
You can call me GCEK CONCLAVE BOT.
I'm GCEK CONCLAVE

patterns: what should i come to college
responses:
College is open 9am-5pm Monday-Saturday!
 Second Saturday is holiday ;)

patterns: who is the principal of college?
Who is the head of the college?
responses: Prof.(Dr.) Dulu Patnaik is principal of Government College of Engineering Kalahandi.It is with great pride and privilege that I welcome you to Government College of Engineering, Bhawanipatna, Kalahandi and I hope you enjoy visiting our wonderful campus. Our institution is a learning community that seeks success for each student as we strive to deepen our core values of: discipline, life-long learning, respect and responsibility.For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/theinstitute/principals_message to know more.

who is the head of the department of computer science and engineering of Government College of Engineering Kalahandi
responses: Dr. Basanta Kumar Swain is head of CSE department.Department of Computer Science & Engineering is started in the year of 2009 to cater the needs of the Western Odisha region. The department offers students an undergraduate program which is affiliated to Biju Patnaik University of Technology (BPUT), Rourkela.For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/departments/computer_science_engineering to know more.

responses: Dr. ASINI KUMAR BALIARSINGH is head of Electrical Engineering department.The Department of Electrical Engineering started in the year 1997.The 4-year B.Tech course study includes fundamentals of Electrical Engineering embedded with Electrical Machines, Power System, Power Electronics, Control, Electronics, Communication, Signal processing and Artificial Intelligence.For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/departments/electrical_engineering to know more.

responses: Prof.Laxmi Narayan Rout is head of Mechanical Engineering department.The department of Mechanical Engineering at GCEK, Bhawanipatna offers a B.Tech programme and an M.Tech programme in the specialization of Thermal Engineering. This is the biggest department in the College; with a student strength of about 558.For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/departments/mechanical_engineering to know more.

patterns: what are differnt clubs in GCEK
whar are extra-circular acitivities in GCEK
How many clubs does college have?
responses:
GCEK offers a range of extracurricular activities through its various clubs and societies.GCEK provides various opportunities for students to engage in extracurricular activities through its clubs and societies.
 Some of the popular clubs are the 1)Literary Club 
 2)Music Club 
 3)Dance Club 
 4)Fine Arts Club 
 5)Nature Club 
 6)Entrepreneurship Club etc. 
 joining these clubs can help students develop their skills and interests outside the classroom.

responses: For Undergraduate the courses are CIVIL ENGINEERING,COMPUTER SCIENCE & ENGINEERING,ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING,MECHANICAL ENGINEERING and Postgraduate courses are ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING and MECHANICAL ENGINEERING. For more information visit  https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/academics/course to know more

patterns: how to get seat in college
How can i get into GCEK?
what is the admission process at GCEK?
what is the process of admission
How to take admission in your college
what is the process for admission
responses:
The admission procedure for Government College of Engineering Kalahandi, Bhawanipatna is as per Biju Patnaik University of Technology, Odisha (BPUT) norms and is strictly governed by Odisha Joint Entrance Examination (OJEE).
 For details view: visit http://www.bput.ac.in/, Odisha (Make a tab, give BPUT Logo as on home page and give link to BPUT Website) 
 and visit  https://odishajee.com/ ,Odisha (Make a small Tab and give link to JEE website)

patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: Government College of Engineering Kalahandi, Bhawanipatna is a well-known college in the Western region of Odisha. So many students from different regions of the state & country are perceiving their studies in this college. To provide accommodation facilities for such students, Government College of Engineering Kalahandi, Bhawanipatna Provides hostel facilities. College has 3 hostels within its campus which includes 2 for boys and 1 for girls. The Hostel Facilities are very good and the environment in the hostel is also suitable to flourish.For more information visit: https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/facilities/hostel

patterns: list of events conducted in college
what events are conducted in college
Are there any event held at college
list of events organised in college
responses: GCEK organizes a variety of events throughout the year, including technical fests, cultural fests, sports events, workshops, seminars, and guest lectures. Some of the major events are the annual technical fest 'TechFest' and the cultural fest 'Zephyr'. We also celebrate national and international events such as Independence Day, Republic Day, International Women's Day, and World Environment Day. Stay tuned for updates on upcoming events!

patterns: Is there a cafetaria in college

responses:
If you are looking for food in GCEK, you can visit the college canteen which offers a variety of food options like 1)Fast food 
 2)South Indian 
 3)North Indian 
 4)Chinese 
 5)bakery items and beverages 
 It is located near the main entrance of the college.

patterns: What services are offered at the computer center?
How can I book a computer in advance?
Can I get technical support at the computer center?
Is printing available at the computer center?
Can I rent equipment from the computer center?
What are the hours of operation for the computer center?
How do I access the internet at the computer center?
What are the fees associated with using the computer center?
What software is available at the computer center?
How do I connect to the wireless network at the computer center?
responses: A modern computer center occupying an area of 168 sq. mtr. serves as a central facility for all the departments. All the terminals in the center and computer Labs are connected through high speed networking provided by NMICT. All the terminals are provided with Internet connectivity by NMICT with a capacity of 20 Mbps. Apart from all softwares, the center is also equipped with visual aids like LCD projector, multi function printers, Scanners, etc..For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/facilities/computer-center

patterns: What are the amenities available at the guest house of our college?

Is there a shuttle service available from the guest house of our college to other parts of the campus?
responses:
GCEK, Bhawanipatna has a guest house for its employees, visiting officials, Alumni and Parents of the students. Visitors, such as research collaborators, visiting Professors and seminar/FDP/conference participants are also eligible for a short-term stay at the guest house.
 For more information visit https://gcekbpatna.ac.in/facilities/guest_house
